properties.name: supmap.properties.database-name
properties.description: The name of the database to be used by the SupMap application. This property defines the database instance that will store all application data.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-password
properties.description: The password for authenticating with the Elasticsearch service. This credential is used to establish a secure connection to the Elasticsearch instance.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-url
properties.description: The URL endpoint for the Elasticsearch service. This property specifies the location where the Elasticsearch instance can be accessed, including protocol, host, and port.

properties.name: supmap.properties.elasticsearch-username
properties.description: The username for authenticating with the Elasticsearch service. This credential is used alongside the password to establish a secure connection to the Elasticsearch instance.

properties.name: supmap.properties.kafka-bootstrap-servers
properties.description: A comma-separated list of host:port pairs for establishing the initial connection to the Kafka cluster. This property is essential for the application to connect to Kafka for message streaming capabilities.

properties.name: supmap.properties.mongo-uri
properties.description: The connection URI for MongoDB. This string includes all necessary connection parameters including host, port, authentication credentials, and database options required to establish a connection to the MongoDB instance.
